Text: Dude, I love what you are doing but your files(M:TSAU) are not 720p but are actually 1080p. If they really are 720p please don't deinterlace so heavily because my computer cannot handle it. Still I love what you are doing and don't take it the wrong way. Peace and love!
I agree. That goes for part 3 as well. 1 and 2 are perfect.. Thanks for the upload anyway..
